scripts.test: truffle compile && npm run docker:run && npm run docker:wait-gas && npm run test:devnet && npm run docker:stop
scripts.test:devnet: ENS=$(npm run deploy:deps:devnet | tail -1) truffle test --network devnet test/melon_devnet.js
scripts.docker:run: cd ./node_modules/@aragon/kits-beta-base/; docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml up -d; RESULT=$?; cd -; $(exit $RESULT)
scripts.deploy:devnet: ENS=$(npm run deploy:deps:devnet | tail -1) truffle exec --network devnet scripts/deploy_melon.js
scripts.deploy:deps:rpc: truffle compile && truffle exec --network rpc scripts/deploy_deps.js
scripts.test:rpc: truffle compile && ENS=$(npm run deploy:deps:rpc | tail -1) truffle test --network rpc test/melon.js
scripts.deploy:rpc: ENS=$(npm run deploy:deps:rpc | tail -1) truffle exec --network rpc scripts/deploy_melon.js
